channel.title: Dataset on Neural Hydrology
channel.description: Recent content in Dataset on Neural Hydrology

item.title: Caravan MultiMet: Extending Caravan with Multiple Weather Nowcasts and Forecasts
item.description: Additional hindcast/nowcast and weather forecast features for all gauges in Caravan.

item.title: Caravan - A global community dataset for large-sample hydrology
item.description: This paper introduces the Caravan dataset, a global large-sample hydrology dataset that builds on cloud computing to be extensible by anyone.

item.title: CAMELS US: Hourly USGS discharge observations and NLDAS forcings
item.description: This dataset contains hourly discharge observations and NLDAS forcings for 516 CAMELS US basins.

item.title: LamaH-CE: LArge-SaMple DAta for Hydrology and Environmental Sciences for Central Europe
item.description: LamaH-CE contains a collection of runoff and meteorological time series as well as various (catchment) attributes for 859 gauged basins in the upper Danube catchment and Austria.
